thread.title: Miami Open: Uchijima makes second round
thread.title_full: Miami Open: Uchijima makes second round

author: Tennis Majors et ses partenaires
title: Miami Open: Uchijima makes second round
text:
Japanese Moyuka Uchijima moved into the second round of the Miami Open by winning against Dutchwoman Suzan Lamens 6-4, 6-3 at the Hard Rock Stadium on Wednesday evening.
Uchijima, ranked No 53, will face No 32 seed Anna Kalinskaya next.
Miami WTA 1000, other first-round results (Hard Rock Stadium, hard, USD 8.963.700, most recent results first):
Anhelina Kalinina vs. Victoria Azarenka Mayar Sherif vs. Lulu Sun Dayana Yastremska vs. Belinda Bencic: wednesday Peyton Stearns beat Katie Boulter: 6-4, 6-2 Julia Grabher beat Tyra Caterina Grant (WC): 6-4, 6-4 Alexandra Eala (WC) beat Katie Volynets: 6-3, 7-6 (3) Caroline Garcia beat Anna Bondar (Q): 6-0, 7-6 (5) Elina Avanesyan beat Erika Andreeva (WC): 6-1, 6-7 (4), 6-4 Bernarda Pera (Q) beat Ajla Tomljanovic (WC): 6-3, 6-2 McCartney Kessler beat Marie Bouzkova: 6-4, 2-6, 6-4 Emma Raducanu beat Sayaka Ishii (WC): 6-2, 6-1 Veronika Kudermetova beat Xinyu Wang: 6-2, 7-6 (5) Victoria Mboko (WC) beat Camila Osorio: 7-5, 5-7, 6-3 Kimberly Birrell (Q) beat Anastasia Potapova: 3-6, 6-3, 7-6 (5) Anna Blinkova beat Kamilla Rakhimova: 4-6, 6-3, 6-2 Taylor Townsend (Q) beat Ann Li: 3-6, 6-4, 6-2 Ashlyn Krueger beat Renata Zarazua: 6-3, 6-2 Hailey Baptiste (WC) beat Olga Danilovic: 6-3, 6-7 (5), 6-1 Rebeka Masarova (Q) beat Greet Minnen (Q): 6-7 (4), 6-4, 7-5 Sofia Kenin beat Petra Kvitova (WC): 6-4, 7-5 Elena-Gabriela Ruse (Q) beat Polina Kudermetova: 6-1, 6-7 (5), 6-2 Lauren Davis beat Aoi Ito (Q): 6-4, 3-6, 6-4 Linda Fruhvirtova (Q) beat Claire Liu (Q): 7-5, 4-6, 6-3 Rebecca Sramkova beat Lucrezia Stefanini (Q): 3-6, 6-1, 6-3 Naomi Osaka beat Yuliia Starodubtseva (Q): 3-6, 6-4, 6-3 Sorana Cirstea beat Elisabetta Cocciaretto: 6-3, 7-6 (5) Lucia Bronzetti beat Jessica Bouzas Maneiro: 6-4, 6-3 Katerina Siniakova beat Yue Yuan: 6-2, 2-6, 7-6 (4) Magda Linette beat Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova: 7-6 (3), 6-2 Alycia Parks beat Varvara Gracheva: 3-6, 7-6, 6-3 Viktoriya Tomova beat Catherine McNally: 6-3, 2-6, 6-3
